title: Analysis of current state, gaps, and opportunities for technologies in the Malaysian oil palm estates and palm oil mills towards net-zero emissions
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Jaya Prasanth Rajakal, Foo Yuen Ng, Anna Zulkifli, Bing Shen How, Jaka Sunarso, Denny K.S. Ng, Viknesh Andiappan
